name: Margherita
description: Good food is a combination of mouth-watering flavours and healthy ingredients. Your favourite pizza gets a healthy makeover with a multi-grain base

name: Marinara
description: This Italian favorite pizza is a delicious mix of flat bread or base topped with cheese, chillies, onion, garlic sauce and chunks of chicken.

name: Carbonara
description: Make way for the all time favourite pizza!  Oargherita Pizza is to many the true Italian flag as it was created resembling the colors of the Italian flag.

name: Frutti di Mare
description: Think out-of-the-box-cooking, think fusion food. This is what you get when Italian cooking marries Indian flavours.

name: Quattro Formaggi
description: A brilliant, gorgeous looking pizza that is high on flavour yet low on calories can strike a deal with anyone, right.

name: Gunkan Maki
description: Technically not sushi! While sushi is fish that is served with rice and may be adorned with other ingredients, sashimi is simply the raw fish, served as is.

name: Temaki
description: Chirashi, meaning, “scattered,” is a bowl of vinegared rice topped with a mix of raw fish (typically chef’s choice) and various garnishes.

name: Narezushi
description: Maki is cut rolled sushi, traditionally made with a sheet of nori, wrapped around a layer of rice, vegetables, and fish, then rolled up using a special bamboo mat, and cut into 6-8 pieces.

name: Nigiri
description: Nigiri is a style of sushi that is made by molding a ball of vinegared rice by hand and topping it with a slice of raw fish. It’s usually served with two pieces and can be eaten with the hands.

name: Sasazushi
description: The sushi we know today is a far cry from where it began. The original sushi was once a staple dish around various regions of Asia and was salted fish preserved in fermented rice.

name: Chocolate Smoothie
description: A smoothie is a drink made from pureed raw fruit and/or vegetables, typically using a blender. A smoothie often has a liquid base such as water, fruit juice.

name: Mulled apple juice
description: According to the label, the ingredients of Apple Juicy Juice are apple juice concentrate, water, ascorbic acid -- commonly known as vitamin C -- and malic acid.

name: Homemade cordial
description: The mixture is then gently mashed with a muddler. The mint leaves should only be bruised to release the essential oils and should not be shredded.

name: Lemonade
description: Lemonade is a colourless sweet fizzy drink. A drink that is made from lemons, sugar, and water and is not fizzy can also be referred to as lemonade.

name: Coca Cola
description: The Coca-Cola Company is a beverage retailer, manufacturer and marketer of non-alcoholic beverage concentrates and syrups.
